Wayne.description: Male voice, medium pitch, American English

Sarah.description: Female voice, medium pitch, American English

cfg_scale.description: Classifier-Free Guidance scale. Higher values = more expressive but potentially less stable. Recommended: 1.5

ddpm_steps.description: Number of diffusion steps. Lower = faster but lower quality. Recommended for streaming: 5

audio_format.description: VibeVoice generates 24kHz mono float32 audio, converted to 16-bit PCM WAV

notes: VibeVoice uses pre-embedded voice files (.pt), not voice cloning
Voice files contain cached KV states for fast generation
Flash Attention 2 is recommended for best quality (CUDA only)
MPS (Apple Silicon) uses SDPA attention instead
Streaming is supported via AudioStreamer class
